text: Kamala Harris is cutting off Trump's political oxygen  —  🚨 This special, five-edition week of PN is made possible by paid subscribers 🚨 If you aren't one already, please sign up to support our independent journalism.  —  💥 Subscribe to Public Notice 💥

Kamala Harris's Best Strategy to Defeat Trump  —  I hate to say it, but Donald Trump remains the singular most recognized name in the United States.  Since he moseyed down that golden escalator in 2015, he has dominated the American airwaves and algorithms.

Trump is still telling lies he told eight years ago  —  In a speech last week to the National Guard Association of the United States, former President Donald Trump claimed that he was the president who “created” the Veterans Choice health care program, and got it “passed in Congress,” after others had wanted to do so “for 57 years.”

House and Senate Republicans are starting to panic about a huge money gap with Democrats  —  GOP leaders on Capitol Hill are privately — and publicly — warning donors they need more money.  —  Republicans are racing to plug a massive money hole — before it's too late.

Harris to transfer nearly $25 million to help down-ballot Democratic candidates  —  The boost to House, Senate and state-level candidates follows a $540 million fundraising haul for the vice president over six weeks.  —  Vice President Kamala Harris's campaign and the Democratic National Committee plan …

Harris campaign, DNC, announce unprecedented down-ballot spending  —  Harris and the DNC are shipping $20 million to committees supporting House and Senate candidates.  —  Kamala Harris' campaign and the Democratic National Committee said Tuesday they are sending nearly $25 million to support …

Biden and Harris rally in battleground Pennsylvania as Trump sits out Labor Day  —  Biden and Harris made the case for their administration's work with unions as Trump skipped the traditional campaign kickoff day.  He has several events planned later this week.

House Democrats ask Trump if he illegally accepted $10 million from Egypt  —  A recent Washington Post article detailed a now-closed Justice Department investigation spurred by intelligence from 2016 indicating that the Egyptian president sought to give Donald Trump money.

Six ways to rein in Musk  —  (And Musk's infantile response to my criticisms)  —  Today I want to tell you the dangers posed by an out-of-control Elon Musk (in part I), and six ways to rein him in (in part II).  I also provide some personal evidence of how bonkers he is (in my P.S. at the end of today's letter).
